Hi,

I Am Ritesh Ravindra Pakhare

Experienced Pastry Chef with over 4 years of expertise in creating customized cakes and a variety of baked goods, including tea cakes, breads, cookies, brownies, cheesecakes, and diverse desserts. Skilled in delivering high-quality, visually appealing confections that cater to personalized client needs. Backed by a degree in hotel management, with a strong foundation in culinary arts and kitchen operations.

Experience

  • PASTRY CHEF

    CAKES N CHEMISTRY

    Duration:- June 2021 - Aug 2024
    (3 Years & 2 Months)

    • Cakes N Chemistry is a cloud kitchen specializing in custom cakes and desserts, offering a wide variety of premium bakery and confectionery products.

    1. Leadership
  • Team Supervision: Led a team of 5 pastry chefs, providing guidance, training, and support to ensure high-quality output and efficient workflow.
  • Collaboration: Fostered a positive work environment by encouraging teamwork and open communication among team members.
    • 2. Customer Engagement
  • Customer Interaction: Handled customer inquiries and feedback effectively, ensuring satisfaction with products and services.
  • Custom Orders: Worked closely with clients to create custom cakes and desserts tailored to their specific needs and preferences.
    • 3. Inventory Management
  • Inventory Updates: Regularly monitored and updated inventory levels to ensure the availability of ingredients and supplies.
  • Custom Orders: Established relationships with suppliers to secure high-quality ingredients while managing costs.
    • 4. Financial Responsibilities
  • Cash Handling: Managed cash transactions accurately, ensuring proper handling of payments and maintaining financial records.
  • Custom Orders: Assisted in budgeting for the pastry department, contributing to cost-effective operations.
    • 5. Baking Expertise
  • Bread Baking: Specialized in baking various types of bread, ensuring consistency in quality and flavor.
  • Recipe Development: Developed new recipes from scratch, experimenting with flavors and techniques to expand the dessert menu.
    • 6. Continuous Improvement
  • Skill Enhancement: Actively practiced new recipes and techniques to enhance personal skills and contribute to the overall growth of the pastry collection.
  • Trend Awareness: Stayed updated on industry trends to incorporate innovative ideas into the menu offerings.

    Education

    RAMANATH PAYYADE COLLEGE OF HOSPITALITY MANAGEMENT STUDIES

    Bacholr of Science(HOSPITALITY MANAGEMENT STUDIES) * June 2017 - March 2020

    I graduated with a Hotel Management degree from Ramanath Payyade College, where I studied core subjects like Food and Beverage, Housekeeping, Kitchen, and Front Office. I also specialized in Bakery, gaining advanced skills in pastry and dessert-making.

    HOLIDAY INN (INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT MUMBAI)

    Trainee * June 2018 - Oct 2018

    I completed a 5-month industrial training at Hotel Holiday Inn International Airport, Mumbai, where I gained practical experience in Bakery, Front Office, Housekeeping, and Food & Beverage. I worked alongside experienced professionals, handling a variety of tasks and challenges in each department.
